pageTitle: Re: Nex-5N .... comments from a D700 user: Sony Alpha / Nex E-mount (APS-C) Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   I got a feeling it's only a gimmick, because when you scroll the defocus thing up or down, all it seems to do is change the aperture ... which is what you're gonna expect anyways ... Deblur, are you talking about the background defocus thing? I am in awe. Leaving all else aside, the low light ability is HUGELY enhanced by the deblur feature. Mar 21, 2012 Stephen Schwartz, In reply
